title: #213: The Case of Jennifer Levin: "The Preppy Murder": Interview with Bobby Friedman
description:
Laura Richards and Lisa Zambetti are joined by special guest Bobby Friedman, CEO of Bungalow Media Entertainment and Executive Producer of 'The Preppy Murder: Death In Central Park' docuseries premiering on Sundance and AMC November 13-15. 


Jennifer was found dead on August 26 1986 in Central Park. Robert Chambers was arrested. He claimed he killed her accidentally. Chambers committed the crime - yet this case was far from straightforward. Chamber's narrative has been centre stage for far too. Listen to this episode and watch the docuseries for Jennifer's story.



You can watch 'The Preppy Murder: Death in Central Park' about Jennifer Levin's case on AMC and Sundance November 13-15 at 9pm EST:

https://www.amc.com/shows/the-preppy-murder-death-in-central-park


#HerNameWasJenniferLevin

#HerStory
